Application.Repository

Interface LeaderboardRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Leaderboard,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Leaderboard,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Leaderboard,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Leaderboard>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Leaderboard,java.lang.Integer>

    public interface LeaderboardRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Leaderboard,java.lang.Integer>
    An interface to manage the data access to the Leaderboard table.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Corti Lorenzo, Tocchetti Andrea

    • Method Summary

      Returns the Leaderboard entry of a User with the provided unique identifier.
      int findLeaderboardPosition(int points)
      Returns the position of the User in the Leaderboard with the provided score.
      java.util.List<Leaderboard> findOrderByPoints()

      • findByCookie

        @Query(value="SELECT * FROM leaderboard WHERE cookie = :cookieValue",
       nativeQuery=true)
java.util.Optional<Leaderboard> findByCookie(@Param(value="cookieValue")
                                                                                                                                            java.lang.String cookieValue)
        Returns the Leaderboard entry of a User with the provided unique identifier.
        Parameters:
        cookieValue - The unique identifier of a User.
        Returns:
        the Leaderboard entry of a User

      • findLeaderboardPosition

        @Query(value="SELECT COUNT(*) as position FROM leaderboard WHERE points > :userScore",
       nativeQuery=true)
int findLeaderboardPosition(@Param(value="userScore")
                                                                                                                                            int points)
        Returns the position of the User in the Leaderboard with the provided score.
        Parameters:
        points - The total amount of points scored by the User.
        Returns:
        the position of the User in the Leaderboard.

      • findOrderByPoints

        @Query(value="SELECT * FROM leaderboard ORDER BY points DESC, cookie ASC",
       nativeQuery=true)
java.util.List<Leaderboard> findOrderByPoints()
        Returns the list of Leaderboard entries ordered by the scores.
        Returns:
        the Leaderboard ordered by the scores.
